body:
Alright, so I've been really into making resource packs lately, so i thought why not make some for people who dont have a 'Custom' one for them so to say... (If you already have one, I can make you a new one >=))

Since it is hard for me to think what you want for the resource pack, fill out this:

Edit: 16, 32, 64, 128.
What pack do you want it to form from (Give download link plz):
Private?: If you want to receive a resource pack privately give me your skype or a provate social media that I can send it to you.
Orientation: Do you want it for PVP, or just regular minecraft days? (Also for UHC's)
Detail: PLEASE BE PRECISE in what you want for your pack, I cannot read minds. Such as: +Low fire, +Short sword/vise versa, FPS, or anything else, just be specific in what you want
(and just for curiosity) What are you using your resource pack for?: Pretty self explanatory.

Im not sure how popular this thread is going to get, as far as i've seen no-body has posted a 'Public' so to speak, resource pack thread. 

NOTE: Depending on the Resource pack, it may vary the time. Since school is around and such i might not be able to do a whole lot, The estimated time for me to be done is 1-4 weeks.

Thank you! ^~^
body_tagged:

Detail: PLEASE BE PRECISE in what you want for your pack, I cannot read minds. Such as: +Low fire, +Short sword/vise versa, FPS, or anything else, just be specific in what you want
(and just for curiosity) What are you using your resource pack for?: Pretty self explanatory.

Im not sure how popular this thread is going to get, as far as i've seen no-body has posted a 'Public' so to speak, resource pack thread. 

NOTE: Depending on the Resource pack, it may vary the time. Since school is around and such i might not be able to do a whole lot, The estimated time for me to be done is 1-4 weeks.

Thank you! ^~^
title: Resource pack requests! [CLOSED]

replies.body:
I know this isn't specific but could you make a "realistic" pack? Like the shaders mod but in a
resource pack. Is that possible?
replies.body_tagged:
I know this isn't specific but could you make a "realistic" pack? Like the shaders mod but in a
resource pack. Is that possible?

replies.body:
Probably not.

1) Shades are really hard to make like in shader packs
2) Mcmeta is a pain
3) I can't really make realistic packs, I'm kinda only into making small kind of packs, not like full blown out. But i think i can try make some things realistic :)
replies.body_tagged:
Probably not.

1) Shades are really hard to make like in shader packs
2) Mcmeta is a pain
3) I can't really make realistic packs, I'm kinda only into making small kind of packs, not like full blown out. But i think i can try make some things realistic :)

replies.body: I got simple request, could you make a faithful pack (Using the faithful texture pack obviously), and change a few minor things. I would like a it as 128 x 128 so that you can make JUST handheld items (Swords, tools, food) as HD as possible, however I would like the 64 x 64 textures on all the blocks. And just for the sandstone, could you use the 32 x 32 texture for it? Thanks! (In theory I'm asking for a combination of different texture resolutions) Oh and one last thing, so that the bow can show when its going to be a critical hit. Thanks!

replies.body:
Edit: 64/much details as possible (128 would be awesome!)

I like the pack that is called... Natural Beauty Pack? IDK, something like that.

Not Private

I would like it to make Minecraft look beautiful & detailed, but also work in the PvP atmosphere of Avicus.

I would like a different look of blocks. Please make blocks like Obsidian & Emerald/Diamond/Gold/Iron blocks super detailed. I would also like armor super detailed too. A new chest texture would be nice.  Mainly, just make everything else very elegant and natural.                                                                                               Take your time, its fine if it takes awhile.   Thanks!
